👣 Claiming your DataDash Tokens is as easy as 1, 2, 3! Here's how:

1️⃣ Open your web browser
2️⃣ Connect your wallet
3️⃣ Claim your tokens

🤔 Haven't received your transfer code? We've got you covered! 📣
